titleStmt.title: Great Britain parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-GB [ParlaMint.ana]
Minutes of the House of Commons and the House of Lords, Daily Sessions

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval, Parla-CLARIN TEI XML corpus encoding and linguistic annotation.

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Parliament of Great Britain: Daily sessions

correction.p: No correction of source texts was performed.

normalization.p: Text has not been normalised, except for spacing.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenation has not been altered with respect to the source files.

quotation.p: Quotation marks have been left in the text and are not explicitly marked up.

segmentation.p: The texts are segmented into utterances (contributions) and segments (corresponding to paragraphs in the source transcription).

category.catDesc: Legislative period: term of the parliament between general elections.
Legislative session: a period of time in which a legislature is convened, typically one year.
Meeting: Each meeting will be a constitute part of a parliamentary session.
Regular: a regular speaker at a meeting
Guest: a guest speaker at a meeting
acl: Clausal modifier of noun (adjectival clause)
obl: oblique nominal noun phrase modifier
reparandum: Overridden disfluency (here used for program mistakes!)

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to elements giving their name. In this document they are simply local references into the UD-SYN taxonomy categories in the corpus root TEI header.

application.label: Stanford CoreNLP
application.desc: Tokenisation, POS tagging, NER and dependency parsed using Stanford CoreNLP https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/.

org.orgName: Parliament of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

event.label: Fifty-fifth Parliament of the United Kingdom
Fifty-sixth Parliament of the United Kingdom
Fifty-seventh Parliament of the United Kingdom
Fifty-eighth Parliament of the United Kingdom
